articles.author: Brett Miller, Tassia Sipahutar
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for March 20 - Bloomberg
articles.description: A frenetic weekend in finance was met with comparatively small but mostly positive moves in markets Monday, with U.S. and European equity futures rising and a dollar gauge weakening slightly.
articles.content:
A frenetic weekend in finance was met with comparatively small but mostly positive moves in markets Monday, with U.S. and European equity futures rising and a dollar gauge weakening slightly.
